doc.after: Liberian cuisine heavily incorporates rice the country s staple food Other ingredients include cassava fish bananas citrus fruit plantains coconut okra and sweet potatoes 134 Heavy stews spiced with habanero and scotch bonnet chillies are popular and eaten with fufu 135 Liberia also has a tradition of baking imported from the United States that is unique in West Africa 136
